channel.title: Ten X Labs’s Blog
channel.description: Ten X Labs is an Angel and pre-Seed fund that differentiates itself by creating deep, trusting bonds with first-time Founders before they’re even ready for investment. We build on this trust, adding expertise and capital to get in on the ground floor of these minority-led companies.

item.title: Kicks as Currency
item.description: The world’s largest pure-play sneaker trading platform
